dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: What's going on in this town? It feels so deserted.

dialogues.speaker: Old Man
dialogues.text: You're new around here, ain't ya? This town's been struggling since the factory closed down. Folks left in search of work elsewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: That makes sense. But there's something more to it, I can feel it. Something not quite right.
